name: Shirahoshi
text:
If 1 of your Characters with an original cost of 6 or less would be removed from the field by an opponent's effect, you may turn the top card of your Life cards face-up instead.
Opponent's Turn: If you have no other [Shirahoshi] Character with an original cost of 2, your (Sea King) type Characters gain +2000 power.
